name: Monster Realm
blurb: Monster Realm is a fantasy adventure, monster battling-capturing RPG, set in a 3D world to explore and a traditional RPG battle system.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your pledge! Every backer for this level or more will receive a special thanks in the credits of the game.
For early backers only! DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF MONSTER REALM.  This limited price point is only available for the first backers of MONSTER REALM.

DIGITAL COPY OF MONSTER REALM + EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER AVATAR APPAREL SET. Every backer for this level will receive an apparel set for their in-game avatar that is only available for kickstarter backers!
EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER LEGENDARY MONSTER + all previous reward tiers.  Every backer for this level will receive a legendary monster that is only available for kickstarter backers!

EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER BLACK ELITE GAUNTLET + DIGITAL HIGH RESOLUTION GAME MAP + DIGITAL HIGH RESOLUTION CONCEPT ART PIECES + WALLPAPERS + all previous reward tiers.  The elite gauntlet is only available for kickstarter backers and gives your character the ability to carry 6 monsters at the start of the game, and unlimited hearthing between towns in-game.  We've also added in a super high resolution PDF of the game map and multiple high resolution downloads of concept art and wallpapers.

DIGITAL MONSTER REALM ART BOOK + DIGITAL MONSTER REALM MAP BOOK + BONUS STARTING GOLD + BONUS LARGE INVENTORY BAG + SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (SILVER) + all previous reward tiers.  The digital book will include concept art, monster encyclopedia, details about each of the different elements, exclusive information about the adventure setting and characters and full page story artworks.  The Monster Realm Map Book will include world map artwork and detailed maps of all routes, zones and cities.  In addition backers will receive a bonus amount of starting gold and the largest inventory bag to ensure you never run out of storage while adventuring! To show our appreciation we will add your name to the game's credits in silver!

All previous reward tiers + MONSTER REALM T-SHIRT + MONSTER REALM CAP + POSTCARD FROM DEVELOPMENT TEAM.  We really appreciate your contribution and will send you a thank you note in the mail signed by the development team.
MONSTER REALM CAP + MOUSE PAD + EARLY ACCESS BETA KEY + All previous reward tiers.  All backers at this tier will get early access to the game with a BETA KEY.

The Complete Monster Realm package!  MONSTER REALM 18" SPORT DUFFEL BAG + ALL 3 MONSTER REALM MOUSE PADS + ADDITIONAL DIGITIAL COPY OF MONSTER REALM + All previous reward tiers.  Receive a 2nd digital copy of Monster Realm and all rewards from previous tiers including Monster Realm t-shirt and cap.

All previous reward tiers + CUSTOM ANIME PORTRAIT OF YOU!  We'll send you a character sheet to fill out for our art team, then you send us a portrait photo of you and we'll turn you into a full body anime character!  Signed by the development team.

DESIGN YOURSELF AS AN NPC (NON PLAYER CHARACTER) + SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (GOLD) + $150 reward tier.  Help us design Monster Realm!  We'll send you a character sheet to fill out for our art team, then we'll work with you (within reason) to create your likeness as an NPC character that will be shipped in the game!   Let the creativity begin!

DESIGN AN AVATAR APPAREL SET + SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (GOLD) +  $150 reward tier.  Help us design Monster Realm!  We'll send you an avatar design sheet to fill out for our art team, then we'll work with you (within reason) to create your apparel design that will be available for all player avatars to use in the game!  Let the creativity begin!

DESIGN YOUR IN-GAME 3D HOUSE + SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (GOLD) +  $150 reward tiers.  Help us design Monster Realm!  We'll send you a design sheet to fill out, then work with you (within reason) to create a custom 3D house that will exist only in your hometown in your game world!  Let the creativity begin!

DESIGN YOURSELF AS A BOSS NPC (NON PLAYER CHARACTER) IN THE ARENA TOURNAMENT+ SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (GOLD) + $150 reward tier.  Help us design Monster Realm!  We'll send you a character sheet to fill out for our art team, then we'll work with you (within reason) to create your likeness as an NPC character that will be a boss opponent in the arean tournament of the game.  Your character will challenge all other players in the shipped game!  Let the creativity begin!

The Ultimate Monster Realm Pledge Pack! DESIGN YOUR IN-GAME 3D HOUSE + DESIGN AN AVATAR APPAREL SET + DESIGN YOURSELF AS AN NPC (NON PLAYER CHARACTER) + DESIGN YOURSELF AS A BOSS NPC IN THE ARENA TOURNAMENT + CUSTOM ANIME PORTRAIT OF YOU + SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (GOLD) + 5 DIGITAL COPIES OF MONSTER REALM  + $150 reward tier.  You received the complete designer package and the complete digital and physical reward tiers.  We're so honored to have your support and are very excited to make your designs a reality!  In addition, we'll list your name in the credits as a special thanks in gold.

ROUND-TRIP AIRFARE TO BANGKOK, THAILAND (1 person economy) + 1 WEEK (5 day) HOTEL STAY IN CENTRAL BANGKOK + DESIGN YOURSELF AS AN NPC (NON PLAYER CHARACTER) + CUSTOM ANIME PORTRAIT OF YOU + SPECIAL THANKS IN CREDITS (GOLD) + 10 DIGITAL COPIES OF MONSTER REALM + $150 reward tier.  We're so honored to have your support that we really want to thank you for your generous pledge in person!  We'll fly you out to Bangkok, Thailnd to join the Sonic Boom Thailand launch party!  Join us at our studio and Director Matthew Manolovits will give you a tour of Bangkok and show you a great time in the land of smiles!  Then join us for our launch party dinner at the famous Tawandaeng German Brewery and celebrate Monster Realm!  If you were ever thinking about visiting Thailand, this is the opprotunity you've been waiting for.
